post.author: MNeMiC
post.body:
It's not really so hard to create custom textures for Doom 3, as long as you have pictures or something, here's one easy way to add custom textures to this game.

http://www.mnemic.tk/education/videotut ... o_tscc.rar

Size:23.1 Mb
Length:6:22 Minutes

post.author: JayDawg22
post.body:
MNeMiC, I have downloaded all your video tutorials, but I can't get them to run, says I may need a new codec, but I don't know what to do, tried 'em with DivX, QuickTime, and WMP. Thanks for your help.

By the way, the Basic Fog tutorial seems to give a 404 error, just so you know!

post.author: Origin73
post.body:
JayDawg22 : The codec that you need can be found here:

http://www.techsmith.com/products/studi ... wnload.asp

Cheers.

post.author: MNeMiC
post.body: Are you the JayDawg which also makes Video Tutorials?

post.author: JayDawg22
post.body:
LOL I wish I was, so no, I am not... And while i'm at it, you perhaps could help me out with something, I saved a .map a few hours ago, came back, loaded it up and i have a blank map... really fuckin steamed about this... I have this in the console if it helps :

Map_LoadFile: D:/Doom 3/base/maps/technology1.map
No worldspawn in map.
Map_New

Do I need to have a worldspawn in there for it to save? (Do you absolutely have to have a worldspawn in everymap, and if so what exactly does it do?)

I have saved one other "crap map" that I just did for experimenting and it opens fine, but I did compile it, the other I just saved as .map and I also have a .bak file, but ya, when I open it, nothing. Thanks again for all the help. (Past, and future )

post.author: MNeMiC
post.body: LoL, I just helped this other guy with the same problem, just search for "no worldspawn in map" in the forums, I Wrote a perfectly good explanation.

post.author: funcrusher
post.body: Do these videos have sound or not? It's clear enough that you need the TSCC codec to see them, but what audio codec is in use here, if there is actually audio in these videos?

post.author: MNeMiC
post.body: No audio as of yet, will probably be included in the videos soon.

post.author: MNeMiC
post.body:
final update with sound.

Now ALL! My Doom 3 Video Tutorials have sound!

http://www.mnemic.tk/education/videotut ... o_tscc.rar

post.body: Hi, Could you please reupload?

post.author: JayDawg22
post.body:
LOL I wish I was, so no, I am not... And while i'm at it, you perhaps could help me out with something, I saved a .map a few hours ago, came back, loaded it up and i have a blank map... really fuckin steamed about this... I have this in the console if it helps :

Map_LoadFile: D:/Doom 3/base/maps/technology1.map
No worldspawn in map.
Map_New

Do I need to have a worldspawn in there for it to save? (Do you absolutely have to have a worldspawn in everymap, and if so what exactly does it do?)

I have saved one other "crap map" that I just did for experimenting and it opens fine, but I did compile it, the other I just saved as .map and I also have a .bak file, but ya, when I open it, nothing. Thanks again for all the help. (Past, and future )

post.author: MNeMiC
post.body: LoL, I just helped this other guy with the same problem, just search for "no worldspawn in map" in the forums, I Wrote a perfectly good explanation.
